name: Convocation: 483 Final Project
description:
Made May 2014 as the final project for USC's CTIN 483. It was made over a period of 2.5 weeks. Development was mostly done in the SCI basement labs. 

This is a two player single keyboard RTS. 

Creators: Eduardo Llach (lead coder) & Tiffany Zhuang (lead artist).
